meanings.definition: Have in mind as a purpose or goal.
meanings.sent1: She intends to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He always intends to be kind to others.
meanings.sent3: The cat intends to catch the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: His speech intends to inspire the audience to take action.
meanings.sent5: The chef intends to create a masterpiece with his new recipe.

meanings.definition: Plan or mean to do something.
meanings.sent1: They intend to go on a hike this weekend.
meanings.sent2: I intend to call my friend later today.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel intends to gather nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her message intends to convey a sense of urgency.
meanings.sent5: The detective intends to solve the mystery by nightfall.
